title: Job Openings at Kingsfield Diagnostic
content:
Kingsfield Diagnostic provide a comprehensive, accurate and reliable testing to clients across the healthcare sector in Nigeria. Our facilities and experience in diagnostics ensure we can get clinical tests back to you promptly. We also offer wellness packages for the population. Our pathology testing solutions across disciplines including clinical biochemistry, immunology, haematology, sexual health screening and molecular biology.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Laboratory Assistant

Job Location: Lagos, Nigeria

Job Summary
     

            
    




	Qualified Medical Laboratory Scientist to conduct laboratory tests that support accurate diagnosis,  patient care oriented,  while maintaining quality and safety standards.


Key Responsibilities


	Perform routine laboratory tests across relevant departments
	Collect, analyze, and report patient samples accurately
	Operate and maintain laboratory equipment
	Follow quality control and safety protocols
	Maintain proper laboratory records and documentation


Requirements


	BMLS or equivalent qualification
	MLSCN registered
	Completion of internship and NYSC (where applicable)
	Good analytical and communication skills
	Ikorodu metropolis or willing to relocate.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: kingsfieldmedicalservices@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

2.) Medical Laboratory Scientist 

Job Location: Lagos, Nigeria

Job Summary


	Qualified Medical Laboratory Scientist to conduct laboratory tests that support accurate diagnosis,  patient care oriented,  while maintaining quality and safety standards.


Key Responsibilities


	Perform routine laboratory tests across relevant departments
	Collect, analyze, and report patient samples accurately
	Operate and maintain laboratory equipment
	Follow quality control and safety protocols
	Maintain proper laboratory records and documentation


Requirements


	BMLS or equivalent qualification
	MLSCN registered
	Completion of internship and NYSC (where applicable)
	Good analytical and communication skills
	Ikorodu metropolis or willing to relocate.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: kingsfieldmedicalservices@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

3.) Pharmacist

Job Location: Lagos, Nigeria

Key Responsibilities


	Professional dispensing and counselling of patients on their medications as prescribed by physicians.
	Monitoring customers' drug therapies, advising interventions, and performing medication therapy management.
	Conducting health and wellness screening.
	Keeping accurate digital patient records.


Qualification


	Bachelor of Pharmacy.


Required skills


	Patient counselling skills.
	Customer service skills.
	Technical skills..
	Computer literacy is highly essential.
	Team builder and player.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: kingsfieldmedicalservices@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

4.) Sales Assistant 

Job Location: Lagos, Nigeria

 Responsibilities


	Maintain and update daily sales records.  
	Ensure to receive and put incoming supplies on shelves.
	Rotate stock, move older medication to front shelf use prior to expiration date.
	Respond to telephone calls, providing general information and route varied calls to apt party.
	Support pharmacist with all inventory through counting drugs plus supplies.
	Maintain a clean and well-arranged shelves. 
	Ensure pharmacy is always well arranged and clean.
	Previous experience in pharmaceutical sector is added advantage.
	Must reside in Ikorodu metropolis.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: kingsfieldmedicalservices@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Job Openings at Eat 'N’ Go Limited
content:
Eat 'N’ Go Limited is a restaurant group on a mission to become the premier food operator in Africa. So far, our growing family consists of three international brands, Domino's Pizza, Cold Stone Creamery & Pinkberry.
Eat ‘N’ Go limited officially started operation in August 2012 with the premier store at 4, Saka Tinubu Victoria Island, Lagos. Today, Eat N' Go has about 100 stores (outlet) across Nigeria and still growing.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Talent Acquisition Officer

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Talent Acquisition Officer to support our fast-paced FMCG operations.
	The Talent Acquisition Officer will be responsible for managing end-to-end recruitment activities, ensuring timely hiring for open roles, and supporting workforce planning across the business.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage end-to-end recruitment processes for operational and business support roles.
	Collaborate with hiring managers and business stakeholders to support workforce planning and staffing needs.
	Source, screen, interview, and assess candidates to recommend suitable talent.
	Coordinate onboarding and induction activities to ensure a smooth employee integration.
	Maintain accurate recruitment records, candidate databases, and hiring documentation.
	Ensure all recruitment activities comply with labor laws, company policies, and best practices.
	Support employer branding initiatives and talent attraction strategies.
	Contribute to continuous improvement of hiring processes


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
	2–3 years of experience in Talent Acquisition or Recruitment, preferably within QSR, FMCG, or a high-volume operational environment.
	Proven experience managing high-volume recruitment.
	Strong understanding of labor laws and recruitment best practices.
	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and stakeholder management skills.
	Strong organizational skills with the ability to multitask effectively.
	Proficiency in MS Office and HR/recruitment systems.


Click here to apply online

Note: Only qualified candidates will be contacted.

 

 

2.) Human Resource Officer

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a highly organized and professional Human Resources Officer to support our QSR/FMCG operations.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for executing core HR functions, ensuring compliance with labor regulations, and supporting workforce effectiveness across multiple business units.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage recruitment and onboarding for outlet.
	Maintain accurate employee records and HR documentation.
	Ensure compliance with labor laws, company policies, and HR best practices
	Support performance management and staff development initiatives.
	Assist with staff welfare, engagement, and retention programs.
	Liaise with outlet managers on HR-related matters.
	Assist with HR reporting and continuous process improvement.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field
	2–4 years of HR experience, preferably in QSR or FMCG or a fast-paced operational environment
	Strong knowledge of labor laws and HR best practices
	Experience managing high-volume recruitment
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Strong organizational and multitasking abilities
	Proficiency in MS Office and HR systems.


Click here to apply online

Note: Only qualified candidates will be contacted

 

 

3.) Lead Creative Designer 

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos

Job Description


	We are seeking a highly skilled and creative Designer Lead to drive the visual direction of our brand across motion and static design projects.
	The ideal candidate will have a strong eye for design, hands-on expertise in animation and visual storytelling, and the ability to lead creative execution across multiple platforms.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead the creation of high-quality motion graphics and static designs for digital, social, and marketing campaigns
	Develop compelling visual concepts and translate ideas into engaging 2D and 3D assets
	Oversee and execute animations, video edits, and graphic designs from concept to delivery
	Collaborate closely with marketing, product, and content teams to ensure brand consistency
	Provide creative direction, mentorship, and feedback to junior designers
	Manage multiple projects while meeting deadlines in a fast-paced environment.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design, Animation, Multimedia Arts, Visual Communication, or a related field. 
	3-5 years of professional experience in a design role focused on both motion and static graphics. 
	Experience as a graphic designer or in related field or working with corporate brand guidelines across multiple platforms. 
	Proficiency in Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Final Cut Pro, Adobe After Effects (motion graphics) or 3D design software (Cinema 4D or Maya). 
	Advanced knowledge of Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator (static design) or or other video editing software 
	Strong portfolio showcasing both motion and static design work. 


Strong expertise in Adobe Creative Suite, with a focus on:


	After Effects
	Photoshop
	Illustrator
	Proficiency in Final Cut Pro for video editing and post-production
	Proven ability to design and animate across both 2D and 3D environments
	Solid understanding of layout, typography, color theory, and motion principles
	Strong communication and leadership skills.


Click here to apply online

Note: Only qualified candidates will be contacted.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "ontent Creator (Graphics, Video, Blogging & Social Media)",
  "description": "Bedum Estate Management and Development (BEMD) is a Nigerian real estate and property investment brand focused on helping individuals, families, and investors move confidently from aspiration to ownership.

At its core, BEMD operates on the SPICED (Service, Professionalism, Integrity, Customer Satisfaction, Excellence nd Discipline)framework; which exists to simplify property ownership in Nigeria by combining market expertise, structured processes, and long-term thinking. The brand serves buyers who want clarity, security, and value; whether they are first-time homeowners, local professionals, or Nigerians in the diaspora looking to invest back home.

BEMD operates with the belief that real estate is not just about land or buildings, but about progress, stability, and legacy. Every project, advisory service, and client interaction is built around trust, transparency, and sustainable value creation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator (Graphics, Video, Blogging &amp; Social Media)

Job Location:&nbsp;Orazi / Port Harcourt - Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a highly skilled and creative Content Creator to drive our digital presence through compelling visual content, video storytelling, blogging, and social media management.
	This role is execution-heavy and results-driven. Candidates must be proficient in graphic design, video editing, blogging, and WordPress, with the ability to manage and grow multiple social media platforms for a premium real estate brand.


Responsibilities
The following are the key responsibilities:
Content Creation (Visual &amp; Written)


	Design high-quality graphics, flyers, carousels, banners, and marketing materials
	Produce and edit short-form and long-form videos for social media and campaigns
	Write engaging blog articles related to real estate, property investment, market insights, and company updates
	Ensure all content aligns with BEMD&rsquo;s brand voice, visual identity, and marketing goals


Blogging &amp; Website Management:


	Publish and manage blog content on WordPress
	Format posts correctly (headings, images, links, categories, tags)
	Perform basic on-page SEO (meta titles, descriptions, internal linking)
	Update website content when required (images, text, banners, landing pages)


Social Media Management:


	Manage BEMD&rsquo;s social media platforms (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, YouTube, X, etc.)
	Develop and maintain a content calendar
	Write captions and hashtags tailored to each platform
	Monitor messages, comments, and audience engagement
	Analyze content performance and recommend improvements


Video &amp; Media Production:


	Edit videos with clean transitions, captions, sound, and color correction
	Repurpose blog and long-form content into short-form social videos
	Maintain a premium, professional real estate aesthetic


Brand &amp; Marketing Support


	Collaborate with the marketing and sales teams on campaigns and launches
	Support lead-generation initiatives through content
	Stay updated with digital trends, tools, and best practices


Requirements
Education:


	
	Minimum of OND / HND / Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in:

	
		Mass Communication
		Graphic Design
		Marketing
		Media Studies
		Communications or related fields
	
	
	(Portfolio quality and demonstrated skills are prioritized over formal education.)


Experience:


	3-5 years of experience in content creation, digital marketing, or media
	Proven experience managing WordPress blogs and websites
	Experience managing social media pages for brands or businesses
	Real estate or lifestyle brand experience is an added advantage


Required Skills:


	
	Graphic Design

ontent Creator (Graphics, Video, Blogging & Social Media) Job at Bedum Estate Management and Development (BEMD)




        
    

        
        Bedum Estate Management and Development (BEMD) is a Nigerian real estate and property investment brand focused on helping individuals, families, and investors move confidently from aspiration to ownership.

At its core, BEMD operates on the SPICED (Service, Professionalism, Integrity, Customer Satisfaction, Excellence nd Discipline)framework; which exists to simplify property ownership in Nigeria by combining market expertise, structured processes, and long-term thinking. The brand serves buyers who want clarity, security, and value; whether they are first-time homeowners, local professionals, or Nigerians in the diaspora looking to invest back home.
     

            
    



BEMD operates with the belief that real estate is not just about land or buildings, but about progress, stability, and legacy. Every project, advisory service, and client interaction is built around trust, transparency, and sustainable value creation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator (Graphics, Video, Blogging & Social Media)

Job Location: Orazi / Port Harcourt - Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a highly skilled and creative Content Creator to drive our digital presence through compelling visual content, video storytelling, blogging, and social media management.
	This role is execution-heavy and results-driven. Candidates must be proficient in graphic design, video editing, blogging, and WordPress, with the ability to manage and grow multiple social media platforms for a premium real estate brand.


Responsibilities
The following are the key responsibilities:
Content Creation (Visual & Written)


	Design high-quality graphics, flyers, carousels, banners, and marketing materials
	Produce and edit short-form and long-form videos for social media and campaigns
	Write engaging blog articles related to real estate, property investment, market insights, and company updates
	Ensure all content aligns with BEMD’s brand voice, visual identity, and marketing goals


Blogging & Website Management:


	Publish and manage blog content on WordPress
	Format posts correctly (headings, images, links, categories, tags)
	Perform basic on-page SEO (meta titles, descriptions, internal linking)
	Update website content when required (images, text, banners, landing pages)


Social Media Management:


	Manage BEMD’s social media platforms (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, YouTube, X, etc.)
	Develop and maintain a content calendar
	Write captions and hashtags tailored to each platform
	Monitor messages, comments, and audience engagement
	Analyze content performance and recommend improvements


Video & Media Production:


	Edit videos with clean transitions, captions, sound, and color correction
	Repurpose blog and long-form content into short-form social videos
	Maintain a premium, professional real estate aesthetic


Brand & Marketing Support


	Collaborate with the marketing and sales teams on campaigns and launches
	Support lead-generation initiatives through content
	Stay updated with digital trends, tools, and best practices


Requirements
Education:


	
	Minimum of OND / HND / Bachelor’s Degree in:

	
		Mass Communication
		Graphic Design
		Marketing
		Media Studies
		Communications or related fields
	
	
	(Portfolio quality and demonstrated skills are prioritized over formal education.)


Experience:


	3-5 years of experience in content creation, digital marketing, or media
	Proven experience managing WordPress blogs and websites
	Experience managing social media pages for brands or businesses
	Real estate or lifestyle brand experience is an added advantage


Required Skills:


	
	Graphic Design

	
		
		Proficiency in Canva and/or Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator
		
	
	
	
	Video Editing

	
		
		Proficiency in CapCut, Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or After Effects
		
	
	
	
	Blogging & Content Writing

	
		
		Ability to write clear, engaging, and informative blog articles
		
	
	
	
	WordPress Management

	
		
		Publishing posts, formatting content, basic updates, and SEO
		
	
	
	Strong understanding of social media platforms and algorithms
	Good visual storytelling and branding sense
	Time management and consistency


Working Hours


	Monday – Friday: 8:00am – 5:00pm
	Saturday: 9:00am – 2:00pm
	Sunday: Off


Portfolio Submission


	Applicants must submit a portfolio that clearly demonstrates competence in the mandatory skills, including:
	
		Graphic design samples (flyers, social media posts, branding visuals)
		Video editing samples (Reels, TikToks, Shorts, ads, or edited videos)
		Blog articles written by the applicant
		WordPress links or screenshots of published posts or managed websites
	
	
	Applications without relevant portfolio evidence covering these mandatory skills may not be considered.


Other Requirements:


	Ability to commute (THIS IS NOT A REMOTE POSITION)
	Strong internet access and reliable work tools
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
	Openness to feedback and continuous improvement
	Understanding of the Nigerian digital and real estate market
	Willingness to attend on-site shoots or property inspections when required


Remuneration


	Salary: N50,000 - N70,000 / month.
	Competitive salary (based on experience and skill level)
	Performance-based bonuses
	Career growth and skill development opportunities


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, Portfolio covering all mandatory skills and Social media pages previously managed (if applicable) to: info@bemdproperties.com using "Content Creator Application – BEMD" as subject of the mail.

Job Position: DevOps Engineer

Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a skilled and proactive DevOps Engineer to support the development, deployment, and operation of scalable, secure, and highly available systems.
	The ideal candidate will bridge the gap between development and operations by automating processes, improving system reliability, and enabling faster and more reliable software delivery.

	Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines to support automated build, test, and deployment processes
	Manage and optimize cloud infrastructure on platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP
	Automate infrastructure provisioning and configuration using Infrastructure as Code (IaC)tools (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation)

	Monitor system performance, availability, and security; respond to incidents and outages
	Collaborate closely with software development teams to support application releases and environment stability

	Perform system upgrades, patches, and routine maintenance activities
	Document infrastructure, processes, and operational procedures

	Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience)
